items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO GMP zooms 108% on opening day: should you subscribe?
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger's shares are commanding a premium of Rs 239, which translates to a GMP of 108 per cent, against the upper end of the IPO price of Rs 220

items.title: Final Hours! Manba Finance IPO closes today: GMP up 48%; should you apply?
items.description: Several brokerage firms, including Swastika Investmart, SMIFS, and BP Equities, have shared their reviews on Manba Finance IPO for the investors

items.title: IPO fundraise thus far in 2024 third highest in primary market history
items.description: IPO pipeline for the remaining part of CY24 remains strong. 25 companies plan to raise nearly Rs 63,550 crore and have Sebi's approval
